meanings.sent1: The Earth rotates on its axes.
meanings.sent2: The axes of the graph help in understanding data.
meanings.sent3: The axes of the compass got confused and pointed in all directions.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the axes around which her life revolved.
meanings.sent5: The ship's axes were aligned perfectly with the North Star.

meanings.definition: Third person singular present of ax
meanings.sent1: He axes the unnecessary details from the report.
meanings.sent2: She axes through the dense forest with ease.
meanings.sent3: The chef axes the vegetables with precision and skill.
meanings.sent4: His sharp words axes through her defenses.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor axes away at the marble to reveal the statue within.

meanings.sent1: The lumberjacks carried their axes into the forest.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter's tool belt included various axes.
meanings.sent3: The Viking warrior proudly displayed his collection of axes.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the axes chopping wood echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent5: The museum had a display of ancient axes used by early humans.
